function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relational interaction capability may lead to close physical contact between businesses and customers.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement contactless delivery or communication methods to minimize physical interaction.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online ordering platforms, and delivery apps.","People":"Businesses and customers.","Owner":"Business owners and technology developers."}]}
